header.subtitle: Hello, I'm a frontend developer based in Uzbekistan!
header.name: Khodushukur Madrimov

work.title: Work
work.quote: If you work, It will work
work.desc: I started my programming career as a mentor at an educational center in 2021. I'm deeply committed to learning web development thoroughly. I constantly utilize technologies like ReactJS, NextJS, and Typescript. Besides, I also work with backend APIs. Overall, I might refer to myself as a full-stack developer. You can get detailed information about me through this website.

organizations.desc: The company is engaged in developing startup projects. I work as a frontend developer in this company. My main tasks include supporting projects, brainstorming new solutions, and developing new projects.

The company works with an online IT education platform. My position in the company is a senior frontend developer. My main task is to develop CRM and Landing page sections of the platform. In the development of this platform, I use ReactJS, Redux, React Query, Ant Design.

I mainly served as a mentor in this company. Besides, I actively participated in software development in the company. Throughout my activity, I worked on various web applications for the company using ReactJS and NextJS.

projects.title: Mbos Lead System
projects.description: The project provides registration and re-engagement of the company's new customers.

projects.title: Mbos Landing Page
projects.description: The project is created to provide complete information about the company and share projects.
